question: How to add LOGO to the label?
steps: From the Dashboard, click on the 'Settings' tab.
Within the Settings section, locate the 'Logo Settings and Preferences' tab.
Under this tab, click on the option to 'Upload Logo'.
Select and upload your company's logo image from your device.
outcome: Your company's logo will be added and printed on your shipping label.
note: Ensure the uploaded logo is clear and in supported image formats (JPEG, PNG, etc.).
